title: Solitaire Sparkle: Dazzling Diamond Studs
materials: 18K Yellow Gold (Bangaru) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features two brilliant-cut lab-grown diamonds
each approximately 1 carat in weight. Clarity rated VS1
Color rated E. The screw-back posts are crafted from the same 18K gold for maximum security and comfort.
features: Classic solitaire setting. The six-prong basket setting showcases the diamonds' brilliance and fire, maximizing light refraction. The minimalist design ensures these studs complement any outfit.
colors: Warm yellow gold juxtaposed with the dazzling white sparkle of the diamonds. The classic gold and diamond color palette evokes timeless elegance.
occasions: or any special occasion. Adds a touch of sophistication to both traditional Indian attire (Saree
description: Timeless elegance and versatility. These solitaire studs offer exceptional sparkle and brilliance at an accessible price point. The secure screw-back closure provides peace of mind. A perfect modern update to traditional gold Kammalu, making it suitable for all generations.
